A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is an abomination. It completely demolishes the nostalgia of Star Wars. It is a complete nightmare of a film. Wish I had never gone to see it\, because my view of Star Wars is now maimed. DO NOT SEE THIS MOVIE. Disney and Rian Johnson should be ashamed. I’m truly disgusted that they would make something that is so clearly a ploy for money. This is by far the worst Star Wars movie ever made.
